channel.title: Red Bull Racing
channel.description: Recent content on Red Bull Racing

item.title: Autonomous Wall Following
item.description: Alex working hard on our difficult problem Progress For this part of the course we were tasked with making the car autonomously follow the right wall. This involving implimenting perception and control into our F1/10th scale vehicle. To track the wall we utilized the LIDAR present on the car. By reading the sensor data using ROS we were able to impliment nodes to track the car distance from the wall at certain angles.

item.title: Car keyboard control
item.description: Rahul and Alex working on keyboard control Demo: Steering control Throttle control Progress Our team met on Sunday, 31 March 2019 to work on Assignment 3 - F1/10 Teleop. Following the directions in the assignment specifications and the lecture slides, we were successfully able to modify the provided talker.py and keyboard.py files to accept keyboard input and control the F1/10 vehicle. While modifying the keyboard.py file, we had to examine the curses python library to determine which key matched curses.
